statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND date_consumed = '2022-02-28';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE product_name = 'Light Bulb' AND consumed_energy > 100
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND date_consumed < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM optimization_efforts WHERE efficiency < 0.7 AND impact > 0.5;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE company_name = 'ABC Energy' AND energy_type = 'Electricity';
DELETE FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.8 AND optimization_date < '2022-01-01';
